hero_section.title: Project Management Powered by Artificial Intelligence
hero_section.description: Increase your team's productivity and manage your projects smoothly. Accelerate the process with AI-powered workflows, automation, and agile management tools.

services_list.title: Professional Project Management Tools
services_list.subtitle: Speed Up Your Workflow
services_list.description: Combine powerful automation with intuitive tools to increase your team's productivity and your project's success.

features.title: Issue Management
features.description: Bring project issues together on a single platform. Easily manage tasks, bugs, and improvement requests.

features.title: Smart Workflows
features.description: Increase your team's efficiency. Optimize your workflows with automation and smart synchronization.

features.title: Agile Boards
features.description: Manage your projects with agile boards. Easily organize tasks with drag-and-drop functionality.

features.title: AI-Powered Analysis
features.description: Analyze your project data with AI. Predict bottlenecks and improve your team's performance.
